website_summaries.verdict: An attractive and spacious model that is impressive when it works; frustrating when it doesn't due to a high degree of sensor issues.
pros: A large trash can that will hold up to 21 gal
and offers a soft-closing motion-sensing lid
Long battery life – provides up to 10,000 openings/closings and only requires 3 D batteries
cons: Those who don't need a large container may find it bulky
Issues with the lid and sensor have been reported – slow/fast openings, false triggering, and a malfunctioning sensor

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is PERFECT! I really bought it for the large capacity... it was the only nice-looking large capacity one I found. But the motion sensor has become my kids' favorite feature, so much so that we bought giant googly eyes for it, and call it the Trash Monster.
customer_reviews.author: ikandi

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We use the 30 gallon size bags easily bought at any grocery store and they fit just fine. No issues so far at all!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Crompton

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! No check that....Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Quality. We bought this unit when we saw it at a friend's house the first time, when it was actually working. Purchased it right after Christmas 2016. I never thought a little motor like it has to open a little lid would need 3 D batteries, and that those batteries would only last 1-2 months at best.....and now for the past 3 months the lid hardly opens when needed. I've read several reviews about this exact same problem, and our friend's does not work now either. In reading their warranty page, I love how it says "Manufacturer will not offer any refunds or product upgrades"....Real nice! Thanks NineStars, I wonder if you're actually still in business?
customer_reviews.author: Rick Seidel

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. 2nd/replacement order arrived broken too.
customer_reviews.text: This trashcan was the perfect size for us, and reasonably priced- so we were super excited about it. It wasn't working from day #1. It worked about 1/2 of the time we tried to use it but then the lid just stopped opening entirely. We ordered a replacement and the 2nd one never worked at all. So disappointing. Now we are left with a 2nd broken trash can and we have to pay $20 for an oversized box to ship it back and get a refund. :(
customer_reviews.author: alloverandover

customer_reviews.title: This garbage can is in my garbage
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say we loved this item. I really wanted to. I was very disappointed with the craftsmanship and performance. We did not even have this item a year and the lid hasn't worked in 4 months despite replacing batteries. Very dissatisfied. DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: amgrig2

customer_reviews.title: It's been problematic.
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product has a 2 year warranty and we would like to use it. We have had problems with this can intermittently with the opening. Sometimes it just gets stuck in the up position. Today, it just stuck for good. It has functioned well when it did work so maybe this is just a bad unit. Hopefully the company will contact us and we can upgrade our review. Right now, we cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chanda Hilley

customer_reviews.title: REGRET
customer_reviews.text: Lid stopped working for no apparent reason today. Had it for probably 3 months tops. Horrible experience with ordering this product through amazon warehouse from the beginning and now couldn't be more annoyed I spent so much on a REGULAR OLD TRASHCAN.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: This won't Last! Broke Within A Year!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last April and it won't work anymore. It was working fine untill Started showing issues with motion sensor couple months back. Now motion sensor won't work at all. I am planning to replace with simple human one and going to see how it is going to last. I never buy this one again. I don't want to buy trashcan every year. I want a trashcan that will last longer, not just one year. I am disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisb

customer_reviews.title: Sensor issue
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a little bit after a few days the sensor just doesn't work won't open or close automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Consumes batteries extremely fast
customer_reviews.text: I used the new Duracell AA batteries (it takes 6 of them) and it used them up in less than 2 weeks. I'm one day past the return time, so I'm stuck with this thing, but don't waste your money on it unless you own a battery factory. On the other hand, I have a similar trash can that's larger, from a different company, which uses D cell batteries, and that's been going for over a month without any sign of slowing down.
customer_reviews.author: Old Dominion

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: 11 months and it stopped working, you have to press open and close to make it work. I guess i didnt check the purchase date and would be out of warranty by now.
customer_reviews.author: Online junkie

customer_reviews.title: Smells!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the second review I have ever written so clearly I am not happy! This product is pretty to look at the sensor is functional and works great. However, it holds zero scent and I mean zero. I have tried odor free trashnags I have even tried running a air purifier in front of because I like the looks of it. But, I cannot take the trash smell anymore so back to my 30 dollar Target one I bout three years ago. I so wanted to love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the cost it should hold up better or have some type of warranty
customer_reviews.text: Never order again. Product doesn't last. It has a black ring that holds the trash bag. It did't last 3 months before it broke. For the cost it should hold up better or have some type of warranty. Contacted the company and there response was they wouldn't replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as well as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace the one I bought at HOME DEPOT which was 20 dollars cheaper and worked way better! The only reason I had to replace it is because my son threw away the battery pack by accident. It doesn’t detect motion very well and closes too fast!
customer_reviews.author: christopher rehac

customer_reviews.title: We loved this product until it stopped working properly
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product until it stopped working properly. I agree with other reviewers, it's not made to last, after the first few months we had to tape down the sensor pad, then we cleaned it one day and it hasn't worked properly since. Won't open or close at an appropriate time, it's clear the mother board is shot.
customer_reviews.author: WENDY M.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good brand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Dec 25 and by June the lid was going up and down without stopping. I changed the batteries and still have a problem. This is not a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Rissland

customer_reviews.title: Cool at first...
customer_reviews.text: Initial quality is great. Nice and big and it worked every time. Fast-forward a few months...pretty much a garbage can. The lid opens and stays open. When I hit the close button, it closes for 2 seconds and opens again, and stays open. Even when I push the little d down manually, it still opens. I'm gonna turnoff the automatic lid and just glue a handle to the top. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Orleans1971

customer_reviews.title: Love this trash can
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can. HATE that I’ve had it for less than 2 years and the opening mechanism has already gone out. Now I have a $90 manual garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Brandtman

customer_reviews.title: just received product, open shipping box and one side ...
customer_reviews.text: just received product, open shipping box and one side is completely dented, would rather keep item with a discount then wait another week for another. Please let me know if this is an option and I will fix our review. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: It very rarely open when you walk in front of ...
customer_reviews.text: It very rarely open when you walk in front of it. You have to constantly backup and approach it again. Now it's gotten stuck half way open and won't do ANYTHING.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brian Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The electronics of this trashcan has never been as good as the itouchless brand can we had. Got this one because we wanted something bigger. We should've just paid a bit more for a bigger itouchless. About 6 months after getting this trashcan, the lid started to malfunction, and now will not open without pushing it. We have tried the suggestions others have made but no improvement. Trying to act on the warranty is not worth the money for shipping or the hassle. It is around $30 for a lid replacement. No good options to redeem this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TNinME

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Automatic lid stopped working after a 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeronimo

customer_reviews.title: 2017 and worked great for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This item was delivered on Sept 20,2017 and worked great for 2 months. Replaced batteries and the lid opened properly for about a week. I replaced the batteries again hoping that would take care of the problem. But it it did not and the lid does not open at all. The trash can is 2.5 month old and does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying!
customer_reviews.text: The trash can smells no matter what we try and the bag is properly put in there. The sensor lid still works but we will see for how long. We have tried scented bags, sprays febreeze, etc... but still can't get the stink out for more than a day after changing trash bags. Annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I had this 13 Gallon trash can and was sooooo excited to be upgrading to one that could maybe last a whole week, without changing the bag, in my four person house. We don't have trash pick we have to go to the dump which can be challenging during the work week. This trash can is the perfect size, it works great with the brand name 30 gallon bags, bag still doesn't show, not too heavy when full! The motion sensor works great so far, super convenient and much more sanitary. Trash can doesn't stink, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katlin

customer_reviews.title: Super annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Had it since September, won’t stay closed anymore. Super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Donny Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this trash can at all
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this trash can at all. The only thing I like is the size. Nice and big with a large opening. The sensor is SLOW to sense my hand washing over it, sometimes it doesn't open at all. I have to push the open button which isn't easy to get to work either. When the sensor does work and open the lid, it shuts way too fast. For example, scraping a plate into the trash and the lid will slam down on you..... And the plate. The sensor doesn't sense that your still there. I do NOT recommend this trash can.
customer_reviews.author: TXNURSE

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had it two months and batteries have needed replaced multiple times. It quits closing and stays open constantly. Would return it if I could but they made it such a hassle and now return window has closed. Like the same brand liners but says will ship in 1-2 months!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the convenience of this product. However it stopped opening and closing after 4 months. I replaced the batteries thinking maybe they were too low on juice but even with fresh batteries it won't open. The green and red lights still come on so it's clear the sensor still works, but I guess the lid motor or something else is broken. This is way to expensive to fail after only 4 months!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Rain

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: plastic ring broke quick and was hard to find. i believe it is overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: coady

customer_reviews.title: Working trash cans
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is my second purchase and once again the lip will not reset even after I clean the lip, change the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working and opened every time we walked past it
customer_reviews.text: This was THE most annoying trash can. It opened every single time we walked past it, would be hard to open when we actually wanted to open it, and completely stopped working about 6 months after we bought it. I couldn’t fix it and we threw it out eventually. Not worth the price tag. Buy one with a foot pedal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quit working at 90 days. Don’t waste your money. Just has a red light on.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Boone

customer_reviews.title: Quality not worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this product. It's just the right size & its infrared sensor allows hands free use (best feature). The can itself is made of thin material. As a result of that my Nine Stars cracked at the bottom on the inside after 2 months of use which is unacceptable. The quality is not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less then a year old the lid keeps opening and ...
customer_reviews.text: Less then a year old the lid keeps opening and closing Cleaning the sensor did not help Trying to get warrant service. No luck so far Comment added on October 29, 2017. "Lousy/bad design. This product is not ready to be sold to consumers"
customer_reviews.author: Pratibha Bhushanwq

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: The product overall looks nice and works well. However, it arrived dented in three different places. I'm extremely upset that I have paid full price for a damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great can while it works! Breaks way too soon!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this trash can, hated paying so much for a trash can but really enjoyed it's handsfree use. Had it for about a year and a half and the automatic lid has gone bonkers. The lid will try and activate and the motor makes noise of activation when no one is near the can (sensor is clean). I have tried two new sets of batteries and within 2 days it starts doing weird stuff then stops entirely. Really disappointed that this has broken after paying a premium price for it. Unfortunately I wouldn't recommend buying this without a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Gize

customer_reviews.title: no easy option to buy a replacement for less than 70$
customer_reviews.text: bought this less than 2 yrs ago and lid stopped working, to send back is pure pain, no easy option to buy a replacement for less than 70$, just for the lid. loved it when it worked,
customer_reviews.author: sdog

customer_reviews.title: Loved it... until it stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke only after a year of use... it kept opening and closing with no one near the trash. I tried turning it on and off multiple times, changing the batteries and also cleaning it multiple times. Nothing helped. Just wish it didn't break because I loved it up until that point!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK...while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Decent for a year. Deteriorated after that. We kept it clean, replaced batteries regularly, but it still got stupid opening and closing. So of course, buttons started getting used more and more as it malfunctioned. Button covers wore out giving it a poor appearance and more places for dirt and germs to hide. If you buy the OEM recommended bags they pull out easily, and are replaced easily. If you have few people in your family and are very gentle on your trash can you may do OK with this receptacle. A bit over priced for something we felt the need to replace after only 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: B and E Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Was great for about 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working, The plastic on the buttons is gone, the light flashes for some reason... Was great for about 3 months, I'm not paying to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Joey T.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 1 week after warranty ended
customer_reviews.text: Bought a trash can. It was busted in the mail. Not their fault and they fixed replaced it, hince the extra star. This trash can fell apart exactly at one year, right after the warranty ended. I noticed one day it wasn't responsive. Literally the section that holds the batteries had fallen into the gap in the trash can wall. Now I have an expensive broken trash can
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kerbo

customer_reviews.title: DON'T THROW MONEY IN THE TRASH!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give NO STAR at all I would, I hate this product! I was coming home to trash odors and maggots daily, the lid closes and opens on its own or stays open for long periods of time. At the present time, I have to put an object on top of the lid to keep it closed. Although, I did purchase a reconditioned model I would stay away from this product new or used. I'M VERY DISAPPOINTED , MONEY WASTED (TRASHED), ON THIS PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: Anton Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Expected more, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Loved loved loved this trash can for about 3 months except for replacing the batteries weekly and then the motor started running slower and now it’s just a can without a lid. My husband is so pissed at me for wasting money. It might have been a bum one but can’t afford (my marriage) to give a second chance . If had continued to work as first purchased I’d be extremely happy but it’s just not worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged can
customer_reviews.text: Large dent on front of can. Returning for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Gshopper

customer_reviews.title: Not Great!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd day and sensor already doesn't activate like it should. Checked batteries, for dirt on sensor, or blockage. Also reset sensor as well with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: _wes_🤓

customer_reviews.title: My mistake... It was as big as ...
customer_reviews.text: My mistake...It was as big as an outdoor trashcan, a fack I missed in ordering
customer_reviews.author: Henry R

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy company - Do not buy Ninestars
customer_reviews.text: I loved this garbage can for a year. Unfortunately it stopped working right outside the warranty period. I bought a replacement lid for $40 directly from the manufacturer, unfortunately when it arrived it never worked. I’ve been trying to contact the company for almost a month now to get a replacement/refund but they do not answer phone calls (you can’t leave a message because the voicemail is full) and they do not reply to emails. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Orangepink

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: This trash can looks awesome & worked great for the first few months. But then it started acting wonky. As soon as it does that, you’re done for. It’s now 1 week after it’s 1 year warranty expiring & it completely died on us. (No the batteries don’t need replacing) Now we’re stuck with this non working trash can & having to waste more $ to buy a new one. When it was working, the sensor is way too sensitive & would open anytime someone walked by it... killing the batteries. And when it started acting up, wouldn’t even open when we needed it to & now doesn’t open at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after less than two years
customer_reviews.text: I've had this trash can for almost two years but now it's totally dysfunctional. Opens and closes non-stop on its own. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Worked great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Mine lasted exactly 2 months. Worked great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Lid stopped working after only 5 months. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Charles David E

customer_reviews.title: Died after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: 6 months later the motor died. It’s a great size and I liked how it worked when the motor was working but this is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: H.V.

customer_reviews.title: Dented trash can
customer_reviews.text: Product came in damaged. The box was perfectly fine, but when I opened it, I saw that it was dented. I would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jeselyn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dropped lid one time and not far and it broke, would no longer stay shut
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Perez

customer_reviews.title: faulty sensor
customer_reviews.text: Had this trash can less than a year and the sensor to open and shut has stopped working!! very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hunter

customer_reviews.title: So big and we love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I took the chance and bought this trash can. It came very protected in the box and with clear instructions on how to setup. Took me less than 30 sec to get it together. I have had it for almost 3 months and will probably change the factory batteries to name brand. My toddler does sometimes forget and will push the lid down, but it usually corrects when I press the close/reset button. I have to buy 30gal trash bags since it's so big. I only have to nag my husband about taking the trash out 2x a week lol
customer_reviews.author: Chefswife

customer_reviews.title: FIRST USE, FLIP TO INSTALL BATTERIES, LIDS SCRATCHES !
customer_reviews.text: Serious soft product badge and adjacent area- Mars and scratches on any surface, do not turn over and set lid down, or lid gets scratched and look very bad. Trouble is, how does one put the batteries in, with out turning over lid? clear plastic on emblem way too soft and gray paint over black plastic next to emblem skuffs too easily too. Poor product testing for every day use, scarred from day one just putting in batteries for first use! ONE STAR!
customer_reviews.author: Abricot

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only 7 months
customer_reviews.text: We love it, have had 2 over the past 7 years, this one stopped working after only 7 months
customer_reviews.author: Yohn

customer_reviews.title: This garbage can itself is great but frustrating how dented it ...
customer_reviews.text: When we received this product, it was severely dented. No big deal, got a replacement. The replacement was also dented! We hit it out as much as we could and only kept it the dent is hidden, for the most part, due to the wall. This garbage can itself is great but frustrating how dented it was TWICE!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hessler

customer_reviews.title: bad smell, hard to find it's trash bag size, too big
customer_reviews.text: It is too big for an apartment kitchen. It is a good product for restaurants but not a house or apartments. It is super hard to find the trash bag for it at stores (size is odd and not easy to find). You can only find a couple of trash bags through amazon but they are not having anti oder type. Too heavy and hard to empty it. from the first week, I bought it, I had to deal with the trash smell in my place. I ended up just throwing it away to get rid of the above issues
customer_reviews.author: Sn

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, if only needed for a year or so..
customer_reviews.text: Large convenient size, few alternatives, so opted to ignore all the one star 'lid sensor stopped working' reviews.. Mistake. In service about a year, more than some users, but not close to what it should be. Other than that, good can, good motion detector while it worked, build quality (except for sensor) was good. Would be an excellent product if the 'touchless' feature lasted longer. (Hard to open manually, becomes essentially worthless).
customer_reviews.author: Raimu II

customer_reviews.title: Four years going strong!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great can. Holds a ton and if you wonder if it will last, ive had mine 4 years! Just realized! Batteries last well, only change every four months or so and this can gets a lot of use with 5 people in the house! I’m very pleasantly surprised after all this time. If the lid ever slows down I sort of exercise it by open closing by hand ten times or so. Possibly gets some unseen gunk but always goes back to perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nanm

customer_reviews.title: Motor didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January and have loved, loved it... until now. It is September now and the motor seems to be dying a little. It still works, but the lid doesn't lift as fully and sometimes as soon as it opens, the lid starts to drop. I thought it was just the batteries but after replacing them, it's no better. I wanted to just order a replacement lid, but on the company website, the replacement lids for all of their models are listed as out of stock. I'm still hoping I just got a lemon, because it was really great the first seven months.
customer_reviews.author: Bethy

customer_reviews.title: I used to Love it !  But less than a year.  It crapped out.  Support doesn't answer phone or emails.
customer_reviews.text: Great product ! It is wide, Bags are hard to find. BUT I STILL LOVE IT ! I used to Love it ! But less than a year. It crapped out. Support doesn't answer phone or emails. The green light comes on but the lid doesn't open all the time. I am assuming the motor has a flat spot. I tried contacting Nine Stars. No answer ever. It says please leave a message then hangs up and doesn't allow you to leave a message.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyBooch

customer_reviews.title: It opens every time we pass it
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely the size I was looking for. But I've already had to change the batteries and it hasn't even been a week. The thing opens whenever someone passes it. It keeps grand babies both 1yr old from getting in trash but they quickly learned how to make it open. I guess I was expecting something different but it will have to work
customer_reviews.author: Keirstan

customer_reviews.title: I never knew I needed this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trashcan - I don’t know how we lived without it! Does a great job of containing odors, and holds a lot of trash for an active family (or parties). The only downside is it likes to open just by walking by.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: Happy trashing!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used my touchless trash can for a few months now and I love it. I replaced an old trash compactor with this. I was apprehensive since I had used a trash compactor for around 25 yrs. but couldn't justify the new prices of those, and I've got to say, I have not missed my trash compactor since I have the Nine Stars DZT-80-4 Infrared Touchless Trash can. The previous reviews I read before purchasing stated that the lid wouldn't open sometimes. I have experienced this, but it's usually remedied by taking a wet paper towel and cleaning the rim and rubber lid bumpers. The batteries have lasted about a month or so. Very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Connie S Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Spacious holding capacity!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this new trashcan. I love the motion sensor, it works very well. I had to downgraded the battery life, because I've had it for a short time and I am not sure how long it would last so I didn't want to miss lead anyone. It is so big and holds so much, but you wouldn't believe it because it doesn't take up that much space and it looks very clean and nice and holds odors in.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie L Openlander

customer_reviews.title: Talk of the Town
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product right before the holiday. When guests arrived and finally noticed what this product could do, they loved it. Everyone said they either wanted one themselves or needed one. Some of my guests even mention how their office managers spent much more on a trash can that did nothing and did not look as good either. This was an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Pitts

customer_reviews.title: The lid on this can only worked for the first ...
customer_reviews.text: The lid on this can only worked for the first month, it has completely stopped working now. cost way too much for the item to not work.
customer_reviews.author: kmyrstol

customer_reviews.title: Do not By it
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy it, I'm very disappointed. It has no return and it came very crumpled.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Need a bigger trash to throw this trash bin in!!
customer_reviews.text: Spent an entire day trying to fix the sensor. It likes to automatically open and close on its own and doesnt respond to hand or trash at all. Went through the booklet still no luck. Powerd on and off no luck. Hit the closed button to reset it no luck. Gonna call them and try and return this crap but if you are looking to buy a trashcan and have it operate the day it arrives then get the physically opening ones, same thing just cheaper and guaranteed frustration free!!!
customer_reviews.author: saloom

customer_reviews.title: Large trash can
customer_reviews.text: I brought this trash can for thanksgiving It worked great since no one had to touch the trash. This was one of the main reasons I got it was to avoid touching and washing my hands all the time I have had it a week before Thanksgiving and so far it had done a great job. The trash can is a 21 gallon trash which prevents me to making several trips to the my garbage collection trash can. It has a nice ring that keeps the trash bag in place. The silver color matches my appliances color. The price was a good deal and provided a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Motor breaks down after 6 mos
customer_reviews.text: The motor breaks down after a few months a barely opens. If you utilize the warranty it’s like buying the trash can again. Just spend $20.00 for a reputable alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Theatkinsway

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase because of all the negative reviews about it arriving damaged, but I thought I'd give it a shot anyways... I shouldn't have. I was excited when it arrived because the box was in excellent condition. Not a mark on it. The trash can on the other hand, had several small dents all on the front. Meaning it had to have been damaged before it went in the box. When you pay that much for a trashcan, you expect it to be without defects. I would have returned product for refund but husband had already put it in use. The lid itself works fine for now.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived with several large dents. Dents were very ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with several large dents. Dents were very obvious due to stainless steal of item and located throughout. Trash can was also very large. Did not keep long enough to use item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is brutal, the look fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product on May 6 and at first very impressed with it, but over a month in I can tell you it has not worked very well. We have to replace the D batteries about once a week, if not sooner. We get tired of replacing the batteries and have basically gone to using it manually, which defeats the purpose of "automatic". The look is great so it is hard to give it a 1, but I'm going to try and figure out how to contact the manufacture to see what we can do to replace the lid. b
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hill

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: We loved it at first, but after a few months it stopped working. It stays constantly open.
customer_reviews.author: James Griffes

customer_reviews.title: Ideally its the perfect trash can
customer_reviews.text: Ideally its the perfect trash can. However it smells awful after a few days of owning it. It retains the bad odor of the garbage unlike a plastic trash bin. Now I clean my trash can every 2 days. It smells bad even after you clean it. Yesterday when i was cleaning it, a swarm of little flies flew out of it. My whole kitchen started smelling after a few weeks. Its honestly a waste of money. Im so upset I spent so much on it.
customer_reviews.author: Anasia

customer_reviews.title: Came dented
customer_reviews.text: The can came dented. I tried pushing on the dents from the inside hoping they would just pop out and they don’t. Not sure how the automatic lid works yet because I need batteries for it. With out the dents it would look like a very nice trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Matis

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed with this trash can
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this trash can. The inner trash can piece is very thin plastic. It cracked the 3rd time I tried placing a bag in it. The main problem with this can is the smell. We have washed it and sprayed it with disinfectant and it still smells of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, terrible customer service,
customer_reviews.text: the top stopped working right away. tried to buy a replacement from the manufacturer and they managed my payment in an unauthorized manner, taking money through payapal and then claiming that paypal does not work and refunded with no other explanation. Paid a lot of money for this item that does not work, unable to replace parts and a terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Can you love a trashcan?
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love this trashcan. It's the perfect size. Our old trash can had to be changed constantly. This one is big enough to support out family of 5 but at the same time not so big that the trash smells by the time you need to change it. I love the automatic lid. The sensor is great and so far the battery life has been really strong. I expect I will order a second one of these for our downstairs kitchen. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got this one yesterday. I only used it 1 day. It’s broken. The sensor is not working. And the automatic button is not working neither. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Yenthy tran

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed that my trash can was delivered with a giant ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed that my trash can was delivered with a giant dent in it. Would have been an awesome trash can otherwise. Didn't want to go through the hassle of sending it back, so I will settle for a dented trash can that I paid $100.00 for.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Love ninestars products -- this was a replacement for another ...
customer_reviews.text: Love ninestars products -- this was a replacement for another one that lasted over a year. Unfortunately, the lid motor for this product has given out after only 3 months and lid is not listed for sale by itself. Since we can't the lid we will have to switch to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: Don't order this!
customer_reviews.text: We are on our second one. Bith quit working. I returned the first one for a new one. Now that one has quit, and they wont allow this one to be returned! There are only 2 in our home, so its not over used. Its just no goid!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Kent Hinson

customer_reviews.title: To replace it
customer_reviews.text: Just the look Motion detection is malfunctioning even when I change the battery
customer_reviews.author: ya

customer_reviews.title: Sensor stopped working after 45 days.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 45 days, then sensor stopped working. Lid now opens and closes randomly. We have changed the batteries twice and reset numerous times with no resolution. Previously owned the trash/recycle combo model for 2 years without issue. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JustThisGuyYouKnow

customer_reviews.title: I have fallen in love with this trashcan!
customer_reviews.text: I read several of the reviews before purchasing this trashcan and was not quite sure what to expect. I have now had this trashcan for about two weeks and it has been awesome. It is big, but still stylish. I wasn't sure how I would like the automatic lid, but now that I've gotten the hang of it, I don't think I could ever go back to a manually opening the trash can again. I have not experienced any of the technical problems other reviewers have. I hope this trash can will last me a long time, but even if it doesn't, I would happily by another.
customer_reviews.author: CaliDreaming

customer_reviews.title: Buy the smaller can.
customer_reviews.text: It is impossible to find trash bags that fit this trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Sara D. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Sad it already not working
customer_reviews.text: From day one I was in love !!!! If it wasn’t a trash can I would ship it back !!! It’s only been a couple of weeks and stopped work already ! I am sad and mad at same time
customer_reviews.author: Chenique

customer_reviews.title: Great for FIRST YEAR - then lid would not not open
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome for exactly a year and 3 months - then the lid would not open - replaced batteries, still would not open. But It worked great up until this point, 30 gallon trash bags fit great, great odor control - too bad there is a flaw in the lid itself
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The lid on this trash can doesn't lift up all the way, or even half the way. I've wasted money on more batteries hoping it would help but no luck. Would not recommend this to anyone unless you just want to pay a bunch of money for a trash can that you open manually anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and motor only lasted 6 months even with new batteries
customer_reviews.text: Did not last barely past 6 months. Motor is broken on the trash lid even with new batteries. Disappointed with the build qualify
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Large Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: You have to buy super large trash bags, but this company does sell them. The bags are not the fresh smelly ones that I get from Glad so I had to put a deodorizer into the trash can. The Trash can is HUGE so it takes my small family at least 4 days to fill it up. It is very easy yo assemble right out of the box. The directions are easy to follow. FYI the lid operates on batteries so the battery life is only as good as the batteries you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is great take it back even after return window is close
customer_reviews.text: Work for little over a month and stop working. Amazon is great take it back even after return window is close
customer_reviews.author: IPW

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy It
customer_reviews.text: My friend had a trash can from this brand and it lasts her forever so I and our other friend ordered it. After I received it, it was more like a joke. They sent me an used and defective top lid. My friend received one that looked brand new but the sensor doesnt work either. Seems like this brand is not as good as they were anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first time I ever hated a garbage container👎
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy it you dislike waiting to throw your trash away, then passing by & it opens right away. This is the best idea but back to the drawing board on the sensors. Yes, we understand the item. Very well in fact. It just needs work. Nice looking design & perfect for the space but the main function was addressed in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Katster McGee

product_meta.title: NINESTARS Automatic Touchless Infrared Motion Sensor Trash Can with Stainless Steel Base & Oval, Silver/Black Lid, 21 Gal
product_meta.description: This 21 Gal Stainless Steel touchless trash can is designed and engineered by NINESTARS, the world's first legal patent holder. With its sleek rectangular fingerprint-resistant design, it can be used in almost any place, such as the home, office, kitchen, bedroom, dorm room or a kid's room. This durable trash can uses the most advanced sensor technology which can be found in all Ninestars trash cans. Pass your hand or debris within ten inches or a 130° angle from the infrared sensor and the lid will automatically open. The lid will remain open if debris or hand remains within the range of the infrared sensor. Three seconds after your hand moves away from the lid, it will close automatically. Power lasts up to 6 months in normal daily usage. It includes a ring liner to keep trash bag from public view for a neat and clean appearance.
feature_bullets: There is a new version available DZT-80-35 21 Gal SS

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,930 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
